prompts:
Start Phase 5 integration:

1. Read agent_manager.py completely to understand the current implementation
2. Design the provider factory pattern for dual-provider support
3. Create ZaiAgentOptions class (pydantic model matching ClaudeAgentOptions structure)
4. Implement the factory method that creates either ClaudeSDKClient or ZaiMaoClient based on provider
5. Start modifying create_agent() method to support both providers

Do NOT break the existing Claude SDK functionality. We need both providers working side-by-side.

Document your changes with comments explaining the dual-provider approach.
